Register.title: Register and get your free trial

ForgotPassword.title: Recover password
ForgotPassword.Text: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

EmailConfirmation.title: You have successfully registered.
EmailConfirmation.Text: Check your email to confirm your account before logging into the Wazend | WhatsApp API dashboard
EmailConfirmation.NoReceive: Have you not received the email?
EmailConfirmation.EmailNoReceive: Enter your email and we will resend you the confirmation link.

ResetPassword.title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.Text: Enter your new password and confirm it.
ResetPassword.YesAccount: Do you already have an account?
